details.name: WCAG 2.2 - 4.1 Compatible - 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value - Table columns
details.description: The number of columns of this table does not match the number of columns of the visual representation of this table

rule.description: The number of columns of this table does not match the number of columns of the visual representation of this table

error.message: The number of columns %1 of this table does not match the number of columns %2 of the visual representation of this table
